description: This table reports items that indicate an order should be excluded from decision support.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EXCLUDE_FROM_CDS_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The exclude from decision support reason category ID for an order record. 1 indicates an order that was not successfully completed. 2 indicates that the order's result information was documented on the wrong patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unsuccessful Attempt


Documented on Wrong Patient

columns.name: EXCLUDE_FROM_CDS_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the Exclude From Decision Support reason for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Filer


Reviewer

columns.name: EXCLUDE_FROM_CDS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time in UTC when an order record was excluded from decision support.

columns.name: EXCLUDE_FROM_CDS_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user associated with the change to the Exclude From Decision Support reason for the order.

columns.name: EXCLUDE_FROM_CDS_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when an order record was excluded from decision support.
